titleStmt.title: The excise rectify'd, or, A plain demonstration that the revenue now raised thereby, is capable of being improved at least four or five hundred thousand pounds per annum, which is now paid by the subject, but diverted from its proper chanel into private hands
titleStmt.author: Farthing, John.

titleStmt.title: The excise rectify'd, or, A plain demonstration that the revenue now raised thereby, is capable of being improved at least four or five hundred thousand pounds per annum, which is now paid by the subject, but diverted from its proper chanel into private hands
titleStmt.author: Farthing, John.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Farthing. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
